title: Maintenance Extended Notice
content:
Dear dood,
Sorry to inform you that maintenance will be extended. We apologize for this inconvenience.
An additional notice will be posted once maintenance has ended.
The added compensation besides Nether Quartz（free）1600, Gate Key*10, DG Skip Coupon*10 will be sent to your in-game mail after the maintenance. 
Thanks for your patience.

DISGAEA RPG
